price: 1. Nabiyow! Ku sugnow cabsida Alle (adigoo dhowraya xilkuu ku saaray), ha adeecinna gaalada iyo munaafiqiinta. Hubaal Alle waa wax kasta Ogsoone, Xikmad Badan.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
